Now, for those of you who don't understand how RICO works, Here's a quick lesson.  Ricoh doesn't go after individuals, but it goes after criminal organizations.  See, just like any other company, you have groups of people carrying out various tasks, and you have people doing things like payroll and HR, and all of them are working in furtherance of the organization.
